title: Hour 2 - LIV Contracts, Chris Simms
itunes:title: Hour 2 - LIV Contracts, Chris Simms
description:
Dan explains what we've learned about the structure of the LIV Golf Tour contracts and thinks Kyrie Irving would be perfect for a LIV Basketball league. And NFL insider Chris Simms stops by to discuss why the Cleveland Browns are starting Deshaun Watson at QB in the preseason.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
